body: @Mermaidhunter11 well maybe I can offer a little help. How do I contact you?
@Daishinshi could you translate please? I'll typeset if you need, just need the translations.

@KiritoX The old guy is the the young man's uncle and the woman with whom he mad love is his cousin. And you are right he was taken there to make her pregnant because the old great grandma wanted the family to become bigger.
This needs a translation, I want to know whats going on, is she married to that old dude and why was he taken there (to make her pregnant?)
